channel.title: Figmentscape families
channel.description:
[center][b][u]Figmentscape Families. Figmentscape is expanding, so a single server cant hold as many people as want to play, there is around 10,000 registered accounts so basically the creators of Figmentscape want to "expand" this concludes of...[/u][/b][/center] 1. downloading and running the Figmentscape source, 2. Changing your no-ip to a recognizable IP for figmentscape (IE Figmentpk.no-ip.org) 3. does NOT require 24/7 or HUGE amounts on uptime 4. gets automatic admin on site. 5. requires you to use the default Figmentscape server status Advertisement
you will be "assigned" a world, we have a world 1 and world 2. if there is enough, then players can just check the Forums to see if servers online. you MUST keep the char files. you will be PM'd the updated source, Figmentscape V2 is outdated compared.
you CAN update as you wish, just dont change the source. if you wish to quit, just tell me, and ill remove your servers name off the list.
Current Worlds World 1-Figmentscape World 2-Figmentpk
||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||
Questions? PM me or go to http://Freewebs.com/figmentscape http://Figmentscape.smfforfree4.com download V2 here, if joining you get V3 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,257163.0.html

item.title: Figmentscape families
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

[center]Figmentscape Families.
Figmentscape is expanding,
so a single server cant hold as many people as want to play,
there is around 10,000 registered accounts
so basically the creators of Figmentscape want to “expand”
this concludes of…[/center]

  1. downloading and running the Figmentscape source,
  2. Changing your no-ip to a recognizable IP for figmentscape (IE Figmentpk.no-ip.org)
  3. does NOT require 24/7 or HUGE amounts on uptime
  4. gets automatic admin on site.
  5. requires you to use the default Figmentscape server status Advertisement

you will be “assigned” a world, we have a world 1 and world 2.
if there is enough, then players can just check the Forums to see if servers online.
you MUST keep the char files.
you will be PM’d the updated source, Figmentscape V2 is outdated compared.

you CAN update as you wish, just dont change the source.
if you wish to quit, just tell me, and ill remove your servers name off the list.

Current Worlds
World 1-Figmentscape
World 2-Figmentpk

||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||

Questions? PM me or go to http://Freewebs.com/figmentscape
http://Figmentscape.smfforfree4.com
download V2 here, if joining you get V3
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,257163.0.html
